PositionHistory.Description:
Project: LMRPC
Description: This project was developed for a company called Lokesh Machines Limited. This company manufactures CNC machines. We had computerized all of its departments like designs, planning, purchase, account's, marketing, and stores. Provided various screens for work order issue, order acceptation, rejection, Material maintenance in stores, issuing of materials to various departments. We have developed various crystal reports to produce dynamic quotations according to the enquiries received.

Competency.name: implementation of the overall design and architecture
Bachelors Degree > Bachelors Degree Computer science & Engineering

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Bachelors Degree in Computer science & Engineering

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Venkat Kondabolu has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 12 years. Currently he is employed as a Developer at EP ENERGY. Venkat has extensive knowledge of Microsoft .NET Technology, XML, Microsoft C-SHARP, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, ADO, Microsoft ASP.NET, Web Services, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, MS Visual SourceSafe, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Microsoft SQL Server, Database Administration, SQL Server Reporting Services, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, JavaScript, Stored Procedures, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Cascading Style Sheets, Visual Basic .NET, Visual Basic, PVCS, HTML, XSLT, Windows Communiciation Foundation, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Visio, MVC, XML Schema, Windows Presentation Foundation, StreamLine, SQL, SAS Statistical Package, Oracle, Framework, WinForms, SQL Server Integration Services, PowerBuilder, Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft Access, Informix, C Programming Language, XAML, VSS, Seagate Crystal Reports, SOAP, SIP, Quality Assurance, PeopleSoft, PC Hardware, Linux, LINQ, Entity Framework, C++, Activity Diagrams, Active Server Pages, Active Directory, AJAX, XPath, Windows Server 2008 R2, Sybase, SQLPlus, SDLC, REST, PRINT, Microsoft Team Foundation Server, Microsoft Excel, Intel Assembler, Infragestic Tools, HP Hardware, Extension, Data Access Object, DTD, CNC, Business Objects, Bug Tracking System, 4GL, .NET platform. So far Venkat has not gained any managerial experience.
